price: 难道他们没有知道吗？我曾以他们的城市为安宁的禁地，而他们四周的居民被人劫掠。难道他们确信邪神，而孤负安拉的恩惠吗？
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ أَنَّا جَعَلۡنَا حَرَمًا ءَامِنٗا وَيُتَخَطَّفُ ٱلنَّاسُ مِنۡ حَوۡلِهِمۡۚ أَفَبِٱلۡبَٰطِلِ يُؤۡمِنُونَ وَبِنِعۡمَةِ ٱللَّهِ يَكۡفُرُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: awalam yaraw annā jaʿalnā ḥaraman āminan wayutakhaṭṭafu al-nāsu min ḥawlihim afabil-bāṭili yu'minūna wabiniʿ'mati al-lahi yakfurūna
